TopicTitle: Navigation Icons next to NAVBALL are gone!! Trajectory line is White instead of Blue. Please Help

Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone,

I'm new here and have been enjoying this game for about a week now and have run into an issue.The Navigation icons to the left of NAVBALL are gone!! Also, the map view usually has the trajectory to apoapsis as a blue orbit line and when you hover over it, it tells you "time to apoapsis" as well as the altitude. Now the orbit line is white and when I hover over the apoapsis marker it doesn't show the time. Can't add maneuvers either. Also all the markers are missing from the left of my navball. Anyone know what is happening? thanks for any help.

This sounds like a bug, and so it has been moved to the support subsection. Please add as much info as you can, and perhaps screenshots might help. (I've assumed you're not using mods. If you are, list them as well.)
Did you start a new career game? If yes, you need to upgrade certain buildings at the KSC in order to get patched conics.
